pr_title: CAMEL-14425: Polling Optimization: Consider number of maximum message…

timeline.author: oscerd

replies.bodyText: Comment removed. I'm not familiar with the adoc. Can you elaborate what to do here?
replies.author: mash-sap

timeline.author: oscerd

replies.bodyText: Ok. I understood to put the comment in the adoc instead. I updated the commit. Please check :)
replies.author: mash-sap

replies.bodyText: My fault. It looks good. When you can please a note about the change in the adoc, not this comment :-)
replies.author: oscerd

replies.bodyText: Sorry, I'm not familiar with the adoc. Do I need a editor for it? Where should I document my change? I could not see a suitable place in the mail-component.adoc.
replies.author: mash-sap

replies.bodyText:
You just need to add a section here https://github.com/apache/camel/blob/master/components/camel-mail/src/main/docs/mail-component.adoc
By the way, no problem, we can do this later.
replies.author: oscerd

replies.bodyText: Sorry I still don't get it :) What exactly you like me to document? The commit is just code optimization, right? :)
replies.author: mash-sap

replies.bodyText: Usually people notice performance optmizations, but sometime for special cases people may also note problems, so we need to add a note about what you've done between 3.0 and 3.1
replies.author: oscerd

replies.bodyText: I updated the mail.component.adoc. Please have a look.
replies.author: mash-sap

timeline.message: CAMEL-14425: Polling Optimization: Consider number of maximum messages to process earlier during the poll to prevent running through multiple for-loops with all messages
